DO_PRST_SQL_VAL_EXPR.Value: UPDATE GT_CNTNT_ELEM FROM GT_CNTNT_ELEM SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( GT_CNTNT_ELEM.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';CNTNT_ACTIVE_START_DATE_IS_NULL') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE CNTNT_ACTIVE_START_DATE IS NULL
